participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Margaret is warm and nurturing, always eager to help others and share her love for books.
participant_1.background: i am 60 years old. i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i've visited spain a times. i really like to travel.

participant_2.background: i make straight as in school. i am currently in high school. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i won homecoming queen this year.
